definition: Winston Churchill (1874-1965), UK politican and prime minister 1940-1945 and 1951-1955/surname Churchill
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Mr. Knightley, in his turn, saw signs of some secret agreement between Jane Fairfax and Frank Churchill.
sentences.chinese: 而奈特利先生則覺察到簡和邱吉爾之間已有某種祕約。

sentences.english: Churchills were also in town; and they were only waiting for November.
sentences.chinese: 兩位邱吉爾先生也在倫敦，只等着十一月份來臨。

sentences.english: But Churchill understood that you start taking shortcuts, it corrodes the character of a country.
sentences.chinese: 但是邱吉爾深知，一旦走了捷徑就將動搖該國的國本。

sentences.english: Perhaps Beckham is heeding Churchill, who had a penchant for pigs.
sentences.chinese: 也許貝克漢姆夫婦留意到邱吉爾也很喜歡豬。

sentences.english: Winston Churchill exemplified integrity an respect in the face of opposition.
sentences.chinese: 邱吉爾就是面對反對派體現完全尊重的一個典型。

sentences.english: The Socialists were trying to smear Churchill as a warmonger.
sentences.chinese: 工黨企圖誹謗邱吉爾先生是戰爭販子。

sentences.english: The plan rode rough-shed over Churchill's cherished ideas.
sentences.chinese: 這項計劃粗暴地粉碎了邱吉爾的宿願。

sentences.english: Walden saw Churchill pushing through the crowd toward where they sat.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾登看見邱吉爾在人羣中向他們坐的地方擠過來。

sentences.english: Early on the third morning Hoprins visited Churchill.
sentences.chinese: 第三天清早，霍普金斯謁見了邱吉爾。

sentences.english: Churchill's cadences began to roll out of the short-wave radio .
sentences.chinese: 短波電臺裏開始傳出邱吉爾那抑揚頓挫的聲調。

definition: variant of 邱吉爾|邱吉尔[Qiu1 ji2 er3]

pinyin: Di4 yi1 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: General Douglas MacArthur (1880-1964), US commander in Pacific during WW2, sacked in 1951 by President Truman for exceeding orders during the Korean war

pinyin: Wei2 duo1 li4 ya4 Nu:3 wang2

definition: Leningrad, name of Russian city Saint Petersburg 聖彼得堡|圣彼得堡 1923-1991

pinyin: Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2

definition: Jobs (name)/see also 史蒂夫·喬布斯|史蒂夫·乔布斯[Shi3 di4 fu1 · Qiao2 bu4 si1], Steve Jobs

pinyin: Lun2 dun1 Da4 xue2 Xue2 yuan4
